## Notes on bookdown

### Files needed to build basic book:

* .gitignore
* .Rbuildignore
* Index and 01-0n.Rmd files
* _build.sh (enables the build all command)
* book.bib

### Building these files generates:

* book.bib
* _book (folder)
    * .html files (generated from Index and 01-0n.Rmd files)
    * search_index.json
    * libs (folder)
        * gitbook-2.6.7 (folder)
        * jquery-2.2.3 (folder)
